title: PROJET: Yasuo (UPDATE PLEASE)
body: His joke, Taunt, and Laugh all need updated sound effects to match his movement sounds and battle sounds.

replies.body: Uhhh doesn't he always lifts his helmet up before speaking?
Yep. I'm honestly a bit sad he doesn't just have his helmet of permanently, not a big fan of the filter (the rest of the skin is just too good though).

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Fech1v2u,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-22T05:49:48.343+0000)
>
> Uhhh doesn't he always lifts his helmet up before speaking?

Yup! If his helmet is lifted up, he won't have the voice filter. :]

@Sneak Dog Perhaps you can use one of the emote commands to take off/put on the helmet, changing his voice filter. Similar to Night Hunter Rengar's toggleable hood, Neon STrike Vi's toggleable Goggles, and Heimerdinger's toggleable walking animation.
